title: What First Party Studios Would We Trade? - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 67 (Pt. 4)
description:
What Sony 1st Party Studio would we trade for a Microsoft 1st Party Studio?

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

transcript_chunks.text: Kinda Funny Live 2 is happening May 28th and 29th, it's a 2-day event. The first day is going to be a completely ridiculous stage show what we have planned this year completely blows last year out of the water and I don't even know how that's possible cuz we were really stupid last year and this year's somehow even stupider. Day two it's going to be full day of meet and greets, we're hanging out with all of us, a bunch of Rooster Teeth people are there, Funhaus people are there, Achievement Hunter, it's going to be a grand old time, there's going to be some games to play, there's going to be signings, it's it's exciting, it's a really fun time, there's going to be exclusive merch. Oh yeah, there definitely going to be exclusive merch. Go to KindaFunny.com to get your tickets today, there's a couple VIP tickets still available so make sure if you want one of those you act fast. Final topic of the day as always brought to you by the Kinda Funny forums, go to KindaFunny.com/forums.
